document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , Siberia ( Caldara 2013a ).

Material examined. Zakarpatska Prov.
:
2 spec. ( ZIN ) Rakhiv Distr. , Chorna Tysa , A. Kreslawski leg.,
14.vi.1973
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) idem,
27.vi.1973
;
Volyn Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Markovichi , A. Yakovlev leg.,
4.v.1898
;
1 spec. (KrC) Shatsk Distr. , Pishcha , Ladinka ponds, A.M. Kravchenko leg.,
8.vi.2003
; Zakarpatska Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) near Kolochava , biological station of NSPU , V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
17.vi.2015
;
Khmelnytskyi Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kamianets-Podilskyi, B . Jakubowski & I. Jakubowski leg.,
11.vi.1911
;
Zhytomyr Prov. :
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Borschiv , 12 km from Radomyshl , Birulya leg.,
28.vi.1910
;
Kyiv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Bila Tserkva , V . A. Zaitsev leg.,
21.vii.1904
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kyiv
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Kyiv , Urochyshche Lysa Hora , near swamp,
on
Eupatorium cannabinum , V.Yu. Nazarenko
leg.,
27.v.1999
;
Poltava Prov.
:
3 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava , D. Ogloblin leg.,
5.vi.1910
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Poltava env., Th. Lukjanovitsh leg.,
18.v.1922
;

2 spec. ( ZIN ) idem,
4.vii.1926

;

: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Zmiiv , Arnoldi leg.,
vi.1917
.

Biology. Forests, meadows, shrublands. Adults occur in V–IX (Gumovsky 1997). On Scrophulariaceae :
Scrophularia umbrosa ( Penecke 1928 )
;
S. nodosa
( Penecke 1928 ; Wingelmüller 1937 ; Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1976 ; Isayev 2007);
S. canina ( Hoffmann 1958 )
;
Limosella aquatica
(it is probably misidentified
Scrophularia umbrosa
) ( Smreczyński 1976 );
Verbascum thapsus
,
V. nigrum
,
V. blattaria
,
V. lychnitis (Gumovsky 1997)
;
V. densiflorum
,
V. phoeniceum ( Dedyukhin 2012 )
.
